STUDY_TITLE._$: Genome sequencing of a Colombian isolate a Brucella canis

STUDY_ABSTRACT._$: Brucella canis is an important pathogen in dogs. Only few genomes of B. canis are available in public databases and we wanted to study a reference strain of this pathogen isolated from an infected dog in Medellin-Colombia.

CENTER_PROJECT_NAME._$: Genome sequencing of a Colombian isolate a Brucella canis
